PERIMETER ANCHORS

These are anchors that track the perimeter of some shape.

This demonstration uses jsPlumb 1.6.4, jQuery 1.9.0 and jQuery UI 1.9.2.For touch support, jQuery Touch Punch is used.

Rectangle
Ellipse
Circle
Diamond
Triangle
90° rotation
